snippet: Shortly before the Knicks’ victory over Cleveland, the team announced that Jeremy Lin’s knee injury would require surgery, sidelining him for the rest of the regular season.
abstract: New York Knicks defeat Cleveland Cavaliers, 91-75, in NBA action; team is battling to hang onto the eighth and final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference without guard Jeremy Lin, who will miss the rest of the regular season because of a knee injury.
lead_paragraph: Shortly before the Knicks’ victory over Cleveland, the team announced that Jeremy Lin’s knee injury would require surgery, sidelining him for the rest of the regular season.

headline.seo: Lin to Have Knee Surgery and May Miss 6 Weeks
headline.main: Knicks’ Push for Playoffs Will Go On Without Lin
headline.print_headline: Knicks’ Push For Playoffs Will Go On Without Lin
